solution: Writing the equation $\log_{81} (2r-1) = -1/2$ in exponential notation gives $2r-1 = 81^{-1/2} = (9^2)^{-1/2} = 9^{-1} = 1/9$. Solving $2r-1 = 1/9$ gives $r = \boxed{\frac{5}{9}}$.
chatgpt_solution: We can rewrite the equation $\log_{81}(2r - 1) = -\frac12$ as $81^{-1/2} = 2r - 1$. Writing the left side with the base reversed and swapping the bases, we have $2r - 1 = (81^{1/2})^{-1} = 9^{-1}$, so $2r - 1 = \frac19$. Solving yields $r = \frac{10}{18} = \boxed{\frac{5}{9}}$.
